CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 1, 1971, pg. 19, reads: "Musically Inclined Harpers, like to play solo or together as they do here, to please each other, Tom gave Gladys the electric organ for Christmas. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Gladys Coffee Harper and Thomas H. Harper playing electric organ with music from "The Methodist Hymnal," in living room of their apartment in Shadyside
